TopicTitle: Can't figure out how to close the colour manager tab.

Articles.Content: As the title says. I clicked the palette icon to open the colour manager tab. I can't find any way to close it. Clicking the button again doesn't do anything, and there's no "x" button in the corner of the tab. If this is a bug I'll make a report, but I'd like to know beforehand if I'm just missing something.
Click on Selection Tool to the left and it will close the color manager.
Yeah it would be so much easier if you could just click it again to close it.
Yes clicking the other buttons in the toolbox close it. Color manager button should be a toggle.
